title: Processor Design
description: Principles in pipelined processor design, with emphasis on the need for a close interaction between code generation and architecture.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 2200 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3057 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3058 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and ECE 2031 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
